snippet.title: Valfaris | Full Metal Mode Trailer | PC, PS4, Xbox One & Switch
snippet.description:
OUT NOW
PC- https://store.steampowered.com/app/600130?utm_source=youtube
Switch - https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/valfaris-switch/
PS4 NA/EU - https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/valfaris-ps4/
Xbox -  https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/valfaris/9nddsfpb5w56

Discord: https://discord.gg/bigsugar

The free 'Full Metal Mode' update for heavy metal action-platformer Valfaris is now live for the PC and console versions of the game. Not for the faint-hearted, Full Metal Mode is a New Game+ variant that turns the deadly up to MAX by remixing various aspects of gameplay:

• All weapons, upgrades, and upgrade items carry over between runs
• Enemies have increased health, attack, and aggression
• Bosses receive the same buffs - with additional attack patterns
• Therion takes more damage
• New Destroyer Class Weapon
• New Steam Achievement for defeating Full Metal Mode

Full Metal Mode unlocks after completing the game, so if you've already got a 'Game Clear' save file, you'll be able to jump into the – even deadlier – action as soon as the update has installed.
